completeListOfAbilities.name: Endless Waltz
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
5-hit ranged BRV attack + HP attack delivered 2 times
Self: 4 turns Less Talk More Action
Inflicting Break while Less Talk More Action active grants additional turn; inflicting Break during additional turn does not grant another
Additional turn does not add to turn count; does consume turn during summoning、 support

ailments.name: Less Talk More Action
ailments.desc: Less Talk More Action: Raises MAX BRV、 ATK; restores a certain amount of BRV

passives.name: Ability Attack Bonus
passives.desc: Slightly increases BRV damage dealt during ability chain\n*Also applies to abilities changed from BRV Attack、 HP Attack
passives.short_desc: Ability Attack Bonus: Increases BRV damage dealt

passives.name: Mighty Rapid Bullets
passives.desc: Moderately increases BRV damage dealt with Rapid Bullets、 Rapid Bullets+
passives.short_desc: Mighty Rapid Bullets: Increases BRV damage dealt with Rapid Bullets

passives.name: Speed Critical Hit
passives.desc: Slightly raises SPD for 1 turn upon unleashing a critical hit
passives.short_desc: Speed Critical Hit: Raises SPD

passives.name: Initiative
passives.desc: Slightly raises SPD for 3 turns at start of each wave
passives.short_desc: Initiative: Raises SPD

passives.name: Bravery Reload
passives.desc: Moderately raises BRV upon using Reload
passives.short_desc: Bravery Reload: Gains BRV

passives.name: Target Legs
passives.desc: Low chance of inflicting 3 turns SPD Down I with BRV ATK\n*Also applies to abilities changed from BRV Attack
passives.short_desc: Target Legs: Inflicts SPD Down

passives.name: Charged Rapid Bullets
passives.desc: Rapid Bullets use +1
passives.short_desc: Charged Rapid Bullets: Raises use count of Rapid Bullets

passives.name: Reload Attack Up
passives.desc: Slightly raises ATK for 3 turns upon using Reload
passives.short_desc: Reload Attack Up: Raises ATK

passives.name: Perseverance
passives.desc: When BRV is at least 50% MAX BRV、 Break is avoided and BRV drops to 1
passives.short_desc: Perseverance: Break is avoided and BRV drops to 1 if BRV is over a certain amount

passives.name: Buffed Attack Boost Up
passives.desc: Moderately raises MAX BRV、 ATK with active buffs
passives.short_desc: Buffed Attack Boost Up: Raises MAX BRV、 ATK

passives.name: Rapid Bullets Extension
passives.desc:
Rapid Bullets use count +2

When using Rapid Bullets、 Rapid Bullets+:
 • BRV attack hit count increased by 1; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Granted effects' duration +2
passives.short_desc: Rapid Bullets Extension: Boost to Rapid Bullets

passives.name: Last Boost
passives.desc: Moderately raises MAX BRV if HP is MAX at start of last wave
passives.short_desc: Last Boost: Raises MAX BRV

passives.name: Reload Extension
passives.desc:
When using Reload:
 • Moderate boost to BRV granted based on ATK
 • Trigger-Happy duration +6
 • Triggers additional HP attack after use

While Trigger-Happy active:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (2-hit ranged BRV attack; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage)
passives.short_desc: Reload Extension: Boost to Reload

passive.name: BRV Up Attack Up Growth
passive.desc: BRV Up Attack Up use +1\n\nBRV Up Attack Up effect duration +2
passive.short_desc: BRV Up Attack Up Growth: Boost to BRV Up Attack Up

passive.name: Firing Acumen
passive.desc: When using Rapid Bullets、 Rapid Bullets+:\n • BRV damage boost\n • Self: 1 turn ATK Up I
passive.short_desc: Firing Acumen: Boost to Rapid Bullets

passive.name: Infinite Ammo
passive.desc:
Reload use +1

When using Reload:
 • Boost to BRV increased based on ATK
 • Turn rate+
 • Trigger-Happy boost、 duration+

passive.name: Eternally Reverberating Report
passive.desc: May equip EX ability Endless Waltz
passive.short_desc: Eternally Reverberating Report: May equip Endless Waltz

passives.name: Mighty Endless Waltz
passives.desc: Slightly increases BRV damage dealt with Endless Waltz
passives.short_desc: Mighty Endless Waltz: Increases BRV damage dealt with Endless Waltz

passives.name: Endless Waltz Advance
passives.desc: When using Endless Waltz:\n • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
passives.short_desc: Endless Waltz Advance: Raises limit of BRV that may be stolen in excess of MAX BRV when using Endless Waltz

passives.name: Endless Waltz Recast Up
passives.desc: Slightly raises recast speed of Endless Waltz
passives.short_desc: Endless Waltz Recast Up: Raises recast speed of Endless Waltz

passive.name: Eternally Reverberating Report Extension
passive.desc: Boost to EX ability Endless Waltz
passive.short_desc: Eternally Reverberating Report Extension: Boost to Endless Waltz

passives.name: Endless Waltz Force Advance
passives.desc: When using Endless Waltz:\n • Tremendous BRV damage boost\n • Slightly raises limit of BRV that may be stolen in excess of MAX BRV
passives.short_desc: Endless Waltz Force Advance: Boost to Endless Waltz

passives.name: Eternally Reverberating Report Extension Attack Boost Up
passives.desc: While equipping EX+ weapon Double Dragons ((T0))+ or passive ability Eternally Reverberating Report Extension:\n • Moderately raises MAX BRV、 slightly raises ATK
passives.short_desc: Eternally Reverberating Report Extension Attack Boost Up: Raises MAX BRV、 ATK

passives.name: Reload Buff Starting
passives.desc: At start of quest:\n • Self: 10 turns Trigger-Happy
passives.short_desc: Reload Buff Starting: Trigger-Happy at start of quest

passives.name: Endless Waltz BRV HP Hit Plus Force Advance
passives.desc: When using Endless Waltz:\n • Triggers 10-hit ranged BRV attack + HP attack after 5-hit ranged BRV attack + HP attack delivered twice; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage\n • Moderately raises limit of BRV that may be stolen in excess of MAX BRV
passives.short_desc: Endless Waltz BRV HP Hit Plus Force Advance: Boost to Endless Waltz
